data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Kochi access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kochi, Japan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Kochi, Japan a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 176 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Kochi with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 4,291 believers in Kochi to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Kunigami people. 1.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Kochi, Japan to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Kochi, Japan to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 4,291 believers in the state of Kochi with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

location.name: Kochi
location.people_groups_list: Thai, Punjabi, South Asian, Bengali-speaking, Malay, Okinawan, Ryukyuan
